> GoInsight is an analytics consulting firm based in New Delhi, India, specializing in enterprise data analytics, Power BI dashboard development, AI/ML solutions, and data visualization across 10+ industries globally.

## Company Overview

- **Name:** GoInsight
- **Website:** https://goinsight.in
- **Founded:** 2022
- **Founder:** Anand Gupta (Fortune 500 veteran)
- **Location:** New Delhi, India
- **Email:** hello@goinsight.in
- **Phone:** +91-7042549224
- **Registration:** MSME registered enterprise

## Core Services

- Analytics Consulting & Strategy
- Power BI Dashboard Development
- Custom Dashboard Solutions
- AI/ML Solutions & Predictive Analytics
- Data Visualization & Reporting
- Data Warehousing & ETL
- Corporate Training (Power BI, Data Analytics)
- Business Intelligence Consulting

## Industries Served

- Retail & E-commerce
- Finance & Banking
- Healthcare & Life Sciences
- Education & EdTech
- Manufacturing & Industry 4.0
- Supply Chain & Logistics
- Sales & Marketing
- Real Estate & Construction
